title: Tomoni Kagayaku Ashita no Tameni.

alternative_titles.ja: ともに輝く明日のために。

synopsis:
The connection between Hokkaido's harsh nature and its warm people. Through the story of a young woman searching for her own path despite her uncertainty, the film depicts "a brighter tomorrow together." With these words as its purpose, the HEPCO Group will continue to support the daily lives of the people of Hokkaido and the future of life on this land. We hope this animation will light a small flame in your heart.''

(Source: Official Youtube, translated)
